tizentv.workspaceSetting.setAsDefault.description: Set your workspace to store your projects

tizentv.workspaceSetting.directory.description: Set your workspace to store your projects

tizentv.targetDeviceAddress.description: Set the TV IP to connect, default remote port is 26101.

tizentv.simulatorLocation.description: Set the location of simulator-executable, eg: c:\\tizen-studio\\tools\\sec-tv-simulator(win) or /home/tizen-studio/sec-tv-simulator(linux/macOS).

tizentv.tizenStudioLocation.description: Set the location of Tizen Studio, eg: c:\\tizen-studio (win) or /home/tizen-studio(linux/macOS).

tizentv.chromeExecutable.description: Set the location of chrome-executable, eg: C:\Program Files\Chrome\chrome.exe (win) or /opt/google/chrome/google-chrome(linux/macOS).

tizentv.logLevel.description: Select log print level: INFO, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL, default is INFO.
